Crime.title: The Godfather
Crime.description: The Godfather is a 1972 American crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola.

Crime.title: Goodfellas
Crime.description: Goodfellas is a 1990 American crime film directed by Martin Scorsese.

Crime.title: The Departed
Crime.description: The Departed is a 2006 American crime film directed by Martin Scorsese.

Crime.title: The Godfather: Part II
Crime.description: The Godfather: Part II is a 1974 American crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola.

Crime.title: Andhadhun
Crime.description: Andhadhun is a 2018 Indian black comedy crime thriller film directed by Sriram Raghavan.

Crime.title: Vikram Vedha
Crime.description: Vikram Vedha is a crime thriller directed by Pushkar-Gayathri. It revolves around the cat-and-mouse game between a righteous police officer, Vikram, and a notorious gangster, Vedha.

Crime.title: Mirzapur S2
Crime.description: A shocking incident at a wedding procession ignites a series of events entangling the lives of two families in the lawless city of Mirzapur.

Crime.title: Mirzapur S1
Crime.description: Mirzapur is a gripping crime thriller series set in the heartland of India, where power, politics, and revenge collide. The story revolves around the lawless town of Mirzapur, ruled by mafia dons and corrupt politicians, as two brothers become entangled in the web of violence and ambition.

Crime.title: Delhi Crime
Crime.description: Based on the 2012 Nirbhaya case, Delhi Crime follows the Delhi Police investigation into the finding of the men who perpetrated this crime.

Crime.title: Paatal Lok
Crime.description: A down and out cop lands the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a journalist. The pursuit of it leads him to 'Paatal Lok', and to shocking discoveries in the past of the four suspects.

Crime.title: Scam 2003
Crime.description: Born in Khanapur in Karnataka, Telgi became the mastermind behind one of the most ingenious schemes in Indian history that spread across multiple states and shook the entire country.

Crime.title: Farzi
Crime.description: An artist who gets pulled into the murky high stakes of a con job and a fiery task force officer on the mission to rid the country of his menaces in a fast-paced, edgy one-of-a-kind thriller.
